I'm playing CSGO since 2013 and I love this game.
this game is very addictive fun and skilled and competitive,
CSGO is a game that you can quit from it but always come back :)
with full team and communication all the time you could really enjoy the game.
playing solo it's quite hard most ppl either talk Russian or don't talk at all.
the devs should probably try to do a better job against cheaters
and not focus on remaking maps and thinking of new crates,
this game can be so much better if the devs invest more on that stuff.
other than that if you looking for a fun competitive game for full team this is it!
